trans-unit.source: Welcome to the PowerShell-Docs repository, housing the official PowerShell documentation [available on MSDN](https://msdn.microsoft.com/powershell/dsc/overview).
trans-unit.target: Welcome to the PowerShell-Docs repository, housing the official PowerShell documentation [available on MSDN](https://msdn.microsoft.com/powershell/dsc/overview).

trans-unit.source: **Note**: right now, this repo is only intended for PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) content.
trans-unit.target: **Note**: right now, this repo is only intended for PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) content.

trans-unit.source: In the future, it may be expanded to include a greater set of PowerShell documentation.
trans-unit.target: In the future, it may be expanded to include a greater set of PowerShell documentation.

trans-unit.source: We will be actively merging contributions into this repository via pull request.
trans-unit.target: We will be actively merging contributions into this repository via pull request.

trans-unit.source: Please note that before contributing, you must [sign a Contribution License Agreement](https://cla.microsoft.com/) to ensure that the community is free to use your contributions.
trans-unit.target: Please note that before contributing, you must [sign a Contribution License Agreement](https://cla.microsoft.com/) to ensure that the community is free to use your contributions.

trans-unit.source: For more information on contributing, read our [contributions guide](CONTRIBUTING.md)
trans-unit.target: For more information on contributing, read our [contributions guide](CONTRIBUTING.md)
